About us..

The goal of our project is to provide a reliable service focused on logging and tracking environmental and health data. Registered users will be able to see their current and past health logs(e.g. heart rate) upon logging in on our website. Furthermore, they will also be able to access environmental data from their current location. Information about user’s health and environment around them is collected via a sensor on a wearable device and sent to our database. Additionally, a user can also add a log of his own health records when registering for the first time. The whole interaction is seamless as all data is collected automatically.

Mobile: 1-800-555-1241 Address: Berthavej 146, Roskilde Email: bertha@bertha.com
